channel.title: Oldtown|Bonner County|Idaho|United States on Roadsign Pictures
channel.description: Recent content in Oldtown|Bonner County|Idaho|United States on Roadsign Pictures

item.title: US-2 East - Entering Oldtown Idaho
item.description: US-2 East - Entering Oldtown Idaho at the Washington-Idaho state line.

item.title: Welcome To Idaho - US-2 East
item.description: Welcome to Idaho on US-2 east. The Idaho welcome sign is about a half mile away from the Washington-Idaho state line.

item.title: US-2 East - Panhandle Historic Rivers Passage
item.description: US-2 - Panhandle Historic Rivers Passage. This is the first US-2 shield in Idaho.

item.title: End ID-41 North at US-2
item.description: End ID-41 north at US-2. ID-41 through Oldtown is on the state line. The east side of the street is in Idaho; the west side in Washington.
